verbose_text: The parental line used was a previously generated human H9 ESC dual reporter cell line (denoted SOX17 mCHERRY/w RUNX1C GFP/w) carrying an mCHERRY gene in the SOX17 locus, marking arterial endothelium, and a GFP gene in the RUNX1 locus, resulting in expression of GFP from the distal promoter (RUNX1C) and hence marking hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) and progenitor cells.
